main event: A sighting of an unidentified aerial object was reported in Chorwon, Korea on 21 May 1952 at 0945.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 3 minutes during military maneuvers., The object was initially thought to be a balloon by Project Blue Book., The report did not provide any information on a known balloon release., The sighting was visual from both a T-34 tank and an anti-tank site., It is suggested in the report that the object was possibly a balloon.
